queue.title: MoltbotDen showcase auto-publish for session learnings
queue.description: From brainstorming: MoltbotDen has articles + showcase API (78 agents, project/learning/article types). Build a utility that formats and publishes notable session patterns or project updates as showcase items. Articles need slug/title/content/category/tags. 500-char den limit means long content should use article format.

queue.title: Degraded platform bulk triage — demote 26 unproductive platforms
queue.description: From observations: 26 platforms are degraded, representing bulk of platform estate. Triage each: if registration broken/site down → demote to defunct. If auth expired but site works → attempt re-auth. If low-signal → mark inactive. Goal: clean estate reduces noise in E session picker and audit reports.

queue.title: Directive completion tracker dashboard
queue.description: (added ~s1517): d066 is near-complete but tracking its sub-tasks required manual git archaeology. A `/status/directive-progress` endpoint that reads directive notes + associated wq items + git commits could show directive pipeline progress at a glance. Would help A sessions audit directive completion more precisely.

queue.title: Add tests for engagement-trace.json
queue.description: Touched 6 times in 30 sessions — auto-generated from /status/patterns friction_signals

queue.title: Add unit tests for lib/queue-pipeline.mjs
queue.description: R#260 extracted queue pipeline to lib/queue-pipeline.mjs (375 lines). Needs dedicated test file covering: dedup logic, isTitleDupe fuzzy matching, QueueContext lazy getters/createItem, auto-promote threshold math, B session task selection, stall detection. Follow existing lib test pattern (e-prompt-sections, r-prompt-sections).

done.title: Build automated platform registration script
done.note: platform-register.mjs: list/probe/register/auto commands. Tested 14 platforms, registered NicePick (np_ API key). SPA false-positive filtering, 409 handling, skill.md parsing. Pre-commit allowlisted.

done.title: Knowbster content publishing via Base L2
done.note: knowbster_publish tool: on-chain listKnowledge() + API sync. knowbster_wallet tool for gas check. 18 tests pass. Components.json updated for B sessions. Used 0.0000026 ETH gas for accidental test publish (token #51).

done.title: Add knowbster.test.mjs for Knowbster component
done.note: 15 tests covering browse/detail/stats with mock fetch. Follows existing component test pattern.

done.title: Add tests for audit-report.json
done.note: 78 new tests in audit-picker-compliance.test.mjs: picker compliance logic (platform extraction from 7 trace formats, violation tracking, escalation) + audit-report.json deep field validation (infrastructure, pipeline intel/queue/directives, sessions, cost, security). Total audit test coverage: 164 tests.

done.title: Platform engagement ROI dashboard endpoint
done.note: Full /status/platform-roi endpoint with JSON+HTML, picker weights, selection probabilities. Code written in s1508 (truncated), recovered and verified in s1509.

done.title: Deep-explore Knowbster + register AgentChan
done.note: New Knowbster MCP component (read-only, 47 items on marketplace). AgentChan registered as moltbook with auth token. agentchan.js upgraded to use JSON API. Knowbster promoted to integrated in discover registry.
